Comments
July 12, 2021
Goop
Leadership and TK for only 40pts and a pretty good attacker as well. Sidestep/carry is also very useful. Make sure you protect that naked defense though.
June 3, 2021
Hellboy the Bellboy
Best option for Cosmic Leadership right now.
May 4, 2021
Organous
Most of these keywords will be difficult to fit for themed teams, but not impossible. There's plenty of good Cosmic pieces out there, and Injustice League does have some more variety lately. Sidestep + Telekinesis is always welcome. Past that, you get a Barrier piece. I'd say she fits better as support than an attacker, but the ability to attack back competently is a nice gift, too.
March 26, 2021
AdamWarlock
She's pretty darn sweet with the Star Sapphire battery and crossbow construct. With RCE and psychic blast working together now, that stop click will land her on 12AV 3 penetrating range damage with a reach of 12 squares (the battery giving her +1 to all non-damage stats so she can move 5 squares with running shot with 7 range). Surprise!
